episodes.name: Inside Shrinking
episodes.overview: A brief introduction to the series.

episodes.name: Coin Flip
episodes.overview: Jimmy, a therapist mourning his wife, takes a more proactive approach with his patients in the hopes that helping them will help himself.

episodes.name: Fortress of Solitude
episodes.overview: To get Sean out of legal trouble, Jimmy reconnects with his estranged best friend—while trying to hide it all from Paul.

episodes.name: Fifteen Minutes
episodes.overview: Jimmy witnesses Gaby in a compromising situation. Paul advises Alice on how to deal with her grief while facing a loss of his own.

episodes.name: Potatoes
episodes.overview: As things spiral at work, Jimmy confronts Liz for interfering in his life. Paul struggles with whether to tell his daughter his diagnosis.

episodes.name: Woof
episodes.overview: When Jimmy hits a roadblock with Sean, he doesn’t have Paul to consult for advice. Brian makes an announcement about his relationship.

episodes.name: Imposter Syndrome
episodes.overview: At Alice’s urging, Jimmy agrees to host a party. Gaby struggles with her post-divorce libido. Liz recommends medical marijuana to Paul.

episodes.name: Apology Tour
episodes.overview: Jimmy attempts damage control after his party. Paul’s daughter pays another visit. Liz and Sean discover they have something in common.

episodes.name: Boop
episodes.overview: Paul and Brian come to Jimmy’s aid when Alice starts acting out. Liz and Sean support Gaby by accompanying her to an event.

episodes.name: Moving Forward
episodes.overview: Jimmy encourages an ambivalent Paul to accept a career achievement award. Sean approaches Liz with a business proposal.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.overview: As Brian’s wedding approaches, Alice takes issue with how Jimmy is living his life. Liz learns a secret.

episodes.name: Jimmying
episodes.overview: Jimmy grapples with his guilt over Grace. Paul makes a decision about his relationship. Liz tries to help Gaby find balance in her busy life.

episodes.name: I Love Pain
episodes.overview: Paul and Jimmy disagree about Sean’s treatment plan. Gaby’s sister asks for her help. Liz has an idea for boosting business at the food truck.

episodes.name: Psychological Something-ism
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Brian help Grace deal with unexpected news. Paul and Julie face her past. Liz worries she’s come between Sean and his dad.

episodes.name: Made You Look
episodes.overview: Paul challenges Jimmy to show restraint with Sean. Derek introduces Gaby to a friend. Liz advises Brian about parenthood.

episodes.name: Honesty Era
episodes.overview: Jimmy helps Alice cope with a huge mistake. Gaby goes home for a family crisis. Liz runs into an old flame.

episodes.name: In a Lonely Place
episodes.overview: Paul and Jimmy look for Sean’s dad. Gaby tries to keep Liz from sinking. Alice is surprised to find out who Brian has been spending time with.

episodes.name: Get in the Sea
episodes.overview: Jimmy spends the day with a patient. Brian crashes Gaby’s date. Liz heads down a dangerous path.

episodes.name: Last Drink
episodes.overview: Jimmy faces Alice’s secret. Liz and Derek are at a crossroads. Paul worries about his health.

episodes.name: Full Grown Dude Face
episodes.overview: While trying to stay out of Alice's business, Jimmy has to "Jimmy" an insecure Brian. Gaby leans on Paul for advice after her sister drops a bomb.

episodes.name: Changing Patterns
episodes.overview: Jimmy tries to give Alice the perfect 18th birthday. Paul helps Gaby with a huge decision.

episodes.name: The Drugs Don’t Work
episodes.overview: Paul encourages Jimmy to seek help. Brian and Derek take Sean to look for a new place. Gaby struggles with her guest list for Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: The Last Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Jimmy takes Paul’s advice about Alice. Liz finally finds her purpose. Gaby hosts Thanksgiving dinner.
